org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowChoreographer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowChoreographer

  • @Implements(value=android.view.Choreographer.class)
public class ShadowChoreographer
extends java.lang.Object

    Robolectric maintains its own concept of the current time from the Choreographer’s point of view, aimed at making animations work correctly. Time starts out at 0 and advances by frameInterval every time Choreographer.getFrameTimeNanos() is called.

      • setFrameInterval

        public static void setFrameInterval(long frameInterval)

        Set the inter-frame interval used to advance the clock. By default, this is set to 1ms.

        Parameters:
        frameInterval - Inter-frame interval.
